name: Furballs Furry Fanvanture
description:
(Made by the Trent Game Development Club)

Cityhall has declared a new law stating that all cats must be on leashes at all times. While the townsfolk go along with this new law, you (Furball the Cat) will not.

You break free from your owners leash and proceed to wreak havoc on all humans with leashes up onto city hall. Shoot hairballs at humans with WASD and Arrow Keys. Dodge leashes and proceed to the right side of the screen.
